title: Customer Service Representative
job_overview:
Join Our Team as a Customer Service Representative! 
Are you passionate about delivering exceptional customer experiences? We’re looking for a dedicated Customer Service Representative to join our team and help improve customer satisfaction and retention.

How to Apply:
Send us a 1-minute audio or video message introducing yourself and highlighting your relevant experience.

Requirements:
Fluent in spoken and written English
Must be consistent
Must have stable internet
Must be willing to contribute to the team
Ability to work Monday–Friday, 9 AM – 6 PM (EST) Florida, USA time (1-hour lunch break)

What We Offer:
Paid sick leave & vacation leave
Competitive bonuses & incentives for top performers
A supportive team environment with room to grow

How to Apply:
Send us a 1-minute audio or video message introducing yourself and highlighting your relevant experience.

We can’t wait to hear from you!
